Room.Name: Nagaritha Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Nagaritha Drive, north of the DeNail Corn Fields.
Room.LongDescription: The DeNail Corn Fields are a prime source of income for many of the less able people of Oceancrest. DeNail is very lenient and lets just about anyone work there if they cannot find other suitable work. Of course that means that he doesn't have to pay them very much either. The entrance to the fields is located off of Hafnia Way, to the west.
